unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer valuable insights. Dr. Sharma's biography on Sachin Tendulkar is inspiring. Knowing his journey from a middle-class Mumbai home to global fame motivates. Details like his early training at Shivaji Park and his Rs. 10,000 bat sponsorship helped. Even the size of his first home - only 400 sq ft - puts his achievement in perspective. These R. embellish character.
